Every dream begins
like uia
little spark
invisible, fragile and easy to ignore. But those who
They dare to believe in it, they feed it with discipline, patience and constant effort until it becomes
A
burning fire that illuminates the world. Success does not come to those who wait; Reach those who rise
every morning ready to fight the same battle with new strength
The path is
long, the nights are
lonely and failures hurt
But every scar shows that you're still in the game. Keep moving forward
Keep trying and one day the same people who doubted you will tell how they knew you before.
that you were unstoppable.
